entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • API Compat implements functionality for checking internal API but does not expose it #28712

Closed

  • Unable to build using <TargetFrameworks> tag on .NET 7 RC1 #28009
  • dotnet test fails on sdk 6.0.200 - System.AccessViolationException #24124
  • Error whilst uninstalling .NET 6 SDK - api-ms-win-core-path-l1-1-0.dll is missing #24347

PullRequests

Created

  • Introduce PublishRuntimeIdentifier #28717
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update current TFM #28715
    Area-ILLink
  • Introduce PublishSelfContained #28714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Limit libstdc++ woraround to TFM <= net7.0 #28710
    Area-ILLink
  • Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28707
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates

Updated

  • Use implicit package reference for ILC build package #28690
    Area-ILLink
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28667
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28668
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2026816 #28689
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve Tests for Implicit RIDs and Libraries #28696
    Area-Infrastructure, DO NOT MERGE
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
